Our Services

Revenue Agency Practices

INPS and INAIL Practices

Management of social security and insurance practices.

Equitalia Practices

Assistance with tax bills and installment plans.

Municipal Practices

Management of all municipal and local administrative practices.

Cadastral Practices

Assistance with surveys, floor plans, and cadastral practices.

Justice of Peace Practices

Support for appeals and practices at the Justice of Peace.

Digital Services

Certified email, digital signature, SPID, and other essential digital services.

DIGIPRAM

Advanced management software for administrative practice agencies.

Request Information

About Us

Acentro Services: Experience and Professionalism since 1986

For over 30 years, Acentro Services has specialized in business administrative practices, offering fast and efficient solutions for companies and professionals.

Led by Nicola Testa since 1986, our company has built its reputation on fundamental values:

  • Economy: We offer high-quality services at competitive prices
  • Customer Focus: Every client receives personalized assistance
  • Timeliness: We guarantee quick responses and immediate solutions
  • Effectiveness: We are committed to successfully resolving every practice
  • Professionalism: Our team is highly qualified and constantly updated

Our mission is to simplify bureaucracy, allowing our clients to focus on their core business.
